node.title: Js developer
node.text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #frontend #javascript #senior #vacancy #remote #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞ #fulltime 

üìç–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: Datagrok (https://datagrok.ai)
üìç–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è: USA, PA
üìç–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç: —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞, —Ñ—É–ª–ª—Ç–∞–π–º
üìç–í–∏–ª–∫–∞: 1000$ - 2500$

–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç: @alexaprm 

Datagrok.ai is looking for a qualified frontend developer to join our strong team of engineers and data scientists. We are a startup developing a next-generation, no-compromises data analytics platform that will revolutionize the industry. Our proprietary technology lets us efficiently process datasets with tens of millions of rows in the browser, and interactively visualize them. We take pride in platform‚Äôs UX and performance, and take advantage of the technologies such as WebAssembly, WebGL, and browser-based multithreaded computations. We have a very well established development process that includes unit tests, continuous integration system, stress tests, integration tests, automated UI testing system, and various deployment options. Our technology stack is primarily based on Dart and Postgres, but also has multiple extension points with components developed in JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, R, Java, and C++. Initially you will be involved in developing new plugins in JavaScript, and extending platform‚Äôs core capabilities to enable that.

There is a lot of room to grow, and there will be many opportunities to assume more responsibilities and learn new domains, such as machine learning, artificial intelligence, or high-performance computing.

This is a remote position.
It would be great if you could send us a project you have developed on your own (github repository is ok), or point to another project you have participated in. 

Responsibilities
* Front-end and back-end web development
* Maintain and improve developer-facing platform‚Äôs JS API
* Help our clients write JS applications on top of the Datagrok platform
* Develop proof-of-concept applications
* Integrate third-party JS libraries into the platform

Requirements
* At least two years of professional experience
* JavaScript or TypeScript
* At least one of (Angular, React, Vue)
* Good written English, ability to communicate directly with our clients
* Strong verbal and written communication skills
* Ability to learn and apply new technologies

Nice to have
* One of (Python, R, Java, C#, C++)
* WebGL
* WebAssembly
* Dart
* Machine learning and statistics
* Prior exposure to life sciences is a plus

‚Äî

üëâ –û–±—Å—É–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ –≤ —á–∞—Ç–µ @javascript_jobs

node.title: Devops engineer
node.text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #vacancy #job #Belarus #Russsia #Ukraine #office #remote #fulltime #flexible #devops #aws #docker  #kubernetes #terraform
Position - DevOps Engineer
Company - Sphere Software
Location - Belarus, Russia, Ukraine
Work - Remote or Office, Full-time
Salary - 3700$ - 4800$ gross (3500$-4500$ nett)

Sphere Software is  partnered innovative trading platform with post-trade settlement and payments system and looking for DevOps engineer. 

Requirements:
üîπ 5+ years of experience as an SRE, DevOps engineer, operations engineer or similar
üîπ Expert at Linux system administration
üîπ Deep understanding of AWS technologies  
üîπ Experience using IaC tools such as Ansible or Terraform 
üîπ Hands-on experience using Docker, AWS ECS or other orchestration tools
üîπ Experience with bare metal infrastructures preferred
üîπ Proficient in Python or alternative scripting language 
üîπ Experience managing a metrics driven system infrastructure
üîπ Familiarity and hands on experience with common CI/CD pipeline tools (we use Jenkins) and container technologies
üîπ Experience using Hashicorp Vault and Consul (big plus)
üîπ Knowledge of cybersecurity mitigation and best practice (big plus)
üîπ Relevant experience from an exchange, proprietary trading firm or top tier bank (big plus) 
 
Responsibilities include but are not limited to:
üîπ Maintain and improve upon the uptime reliability of the overall platform 
üîπ Investigation and handling of issues in all public environments 
üîπ Designing automation tools and improving upon our deployment and release pipeline 
üîπ Build monitoring and alerting tools to keep internal teams and external stakeholders informed about system health and platform viability
üîπ Identify and advocate for changes vital to the stability and supportability of the system
üîπ Support the growth and scale of our infrastructure by suggesting and implementing new technology architecture
 
On-site benefits:
üîπ Competitive compensation and paid time off
üîπ Team of professionals providing you with the opportunity to grow
üîπ Sports compensation
üîπ Team building events.

Feel free to contact me for more info! üëã  @alex_ithr

‚Äî

üëâ –û–±—Å—É–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ –≤ —á–∞—Ç–µ @devops_jobs

node.title: Qa –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä
node.text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è  #qa #senior #remote #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ #fulltime #blockchain 

–°—Ä–æ—á–Ω–æ –∏—â–µ–º –ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞ –ø–æ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é —Å–º–∞—Ä—Ç –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–æ–≤ 

–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞
–ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å: #–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∞—è
–û–ø—ã—Ç: 5+–ª–µ—Ç
–ó–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–∞—è –≤–∏–ª–∫–∞: $2000-$4000

TON Labs - –Ω–µ–∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–∞—è –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–∞—è IT-–∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è  —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –±–ª–æ–∫—á–µ–π–Ω-–ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã TON, —Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π –∏–∑ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 50 —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤, –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤ —Å–æ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ –º–∏—Ä–∞.  –ü—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è —Å –Ω—É–ª—è.

In a blockchain environment, a single mistake could cost you all of your funds ‚Äî or, even worse, your users' funds. Testing of smart contracts according to the specification is a task of paramount importance.

Responsibilities
    Lead the efforts around shipping quality product
    Work with smart contract specification authors to assess specification feasibility   
    Develop test scenarios according to smart contract specification
    Create, develop and manage a unified expandable test automation framework 
    Create automated tests for existing and new smart contracts
    Develop test plans and perform multiple types of testing including functional, system, end to end, load, performance, data integrity, smoke, regression, and ad hoc
    Submit comprehensive defects using our bug tracking system
    Regress and verify defects as needed, record test results, and provide metrics
    Lead and implement plans for improving testing and release processes

Job requirements:
    3+ years of experience in Software Engineering, Test, or Deployment
    Good understanding of an asynchronous messaging model
    Some experience with Python/Unix shell scripting
    Strong analytical skills to work with developers for troubleshooting and peer review
    Effective written and verbal communication skills

The following qualifications are a plus:
    Understanding of basic principles and concepts of the TON Blockchain is a strong advantage
    BS degree or equivalent work experience in Computer Science or related field
    Experience with testing of asynchronous systems is an advantage
    Experience with Scrum and other Agile methodologies

–ù–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏: Ton Labs
–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã: @Marina0733
–î–ª—è —Ä–µ–∑—é–º–µ: marina.k@tonlabs.io

node.title: Js developer
node.text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è
–ì–æ—Ä–æ–¥ –∏ –∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞: –≠–π–ª–∞—Ç, –ò–∑—Ä–∞–∏–ª—å
–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞
–ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å: –ø–æ–ª–Ω–∞—è
–ó–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–∞—è –≤–∏–ª–∫–∞: (–æ–±–∞ –∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã) –æ—Ç 2200$ –¥–æ 4500$ net
–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏:

https://trucknet.io/en/open-positions/middle-senior-backend-typescript-developer/

Who are we looking for
We are looking for a Backend Developer to join our R&D department in Eilat, Israel. Have you ever dreamed of working with a small and capable team in a coastal town on the southern edge of the Negev Desert? Are you interested in creating an eco-friendly product in a domain of logistics and transportation, solving mysteries problems and facing new challenges? If so, the Trucknet team is just the place for you!
Responsibilities
 ‚Ä¢ Implementing new features and providing support for various microservices.
 ‚Ä¢ Proposing, brainstorming and carrying out refactoring to improve the internal structure of our software.
 ‚Ä¢ Improving the developer experience by constantly bettering our toolbox.
 ‚Ä¢ Advancing deployment/integration infrastructure.
Requirements
 ‚Ä¢ 3+ years of professional experience with backend development.
 ‚Ä¢ Acquaintance with Typescript, OOP Javascript, NodeJS.
 ‚Ä¢ Acquaintance with MongoDB and experience with databases in general.
 ‚Ä¢ Practical skills in software architecture and software design.
Advantages
 ‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes.
 ‚Ä¢ Understanding the concept of horizontal scaling and what limitations it does impose on the application.
 ‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of MongoDB, PostgreSQL.
 ‚Ä¢ Experience with CI/CD (we use GitLab CI).
 ‚Ä¢ Experience with test-driven development.
 ‚Ä¢ Experience with AWS.


–ù–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏: Trucknet (https://trucknet.io/)
–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã: @g000seman alex@trucknet.io

‚Äî

üëâ –û–±—Å—É–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ –≤ —á–∞—Ç–µ @javascript_jobs

    Work with smart contract specification authors to assess specification feasibility   
    Develop test scenarios according to smart contract specification
    Create, develop and manage a unified expandable test automation framework 
    Create automated tests for existing and new smart contracts
    Develop test plans and perform multiple types of testing including functional, system, end to end, load, performance, data integrity, smoke, regression, and ad hoc
    Submit comprehensive defects using our bug tracking system
    Regress and verify defects as needed, record test results, and provide metrics
    Lead and implement plans for improving testing and release processes

    3+ years of experience in Software Engineering, Test, or Deployment
    Good understanding of an asynchronous messaging model
    Some experience with Python/Unix shell scripting
    Strong analytical skills to work with developers for troubleshooting and peer review
    Effective written and verbal communication skills

The following qualifications are a plus:
    Understanding of basic principles and concepts of the TON Blockchain is a strong advantage

    Strong analytical skills to work with developers for troubleshooting and peer review
    Effective written and verbal communication skills

The following qualifications are a plus:
    Understanding of basic principles and concepts of the TON Blockchain is a strong advantage
    BS degree or equivalent work experience in Computer Science or related field
    Experience with testing of asynchronous systems is an advantage
    Experience with Scrum and other Agile methodologies
